content: Hey @WG-rustc-dev-guide, according to the compiler calendar we are supposed to have a meeting right now
but it's an event that I forgot to remove
we haven't planned our next meetings, so I'm going to remove the event
Wow, that was our fastest meeting ever :stuck_out_tongue:
Is there a meeting today?
I see a "wg-rustc-dev-guide" meeting marked out for 8:30pm to 9:00pm today on the calendar if that helps

mental said:

I see a "wg-rustc-dev-guide" meeting marked out for 8:30pm to 9:00pm today on the calendar if that helps

tyvm!
hey, yeah, I was asking @mark-i-m about this too
maybe we can sync a bit about everything?
@WG-rustc-dev-guide :wave:
I was telling @mark-i-m that we may want to re-organize a bit our process
and schedule things in a more clear way
I may have forgotten about some things but we were running sprints that were supposed to last 3 months
with periodic syncs, this is supposed to be one of those periodic syncs
but it seems like we may need to re-organize and schedule this set in a more clear way and more importantly schedule our sprints a bit better
this is more like a high level conversation that I'd like to have

about sync content I have some pendings, one that is a bit eternal now :)

  • I was going to place a PR about a rustc-dev-guide structure
  • The eternal list of PRs that we wanted to place in an appendix
Oh, sorry, I don't get zulip pings very quickly...
Yes, I agree that we should talk about how we want to organize things
(I'm not very good at following the compiler team calendar to be honest)
Do we want to have a sync meeting next week (June 16)?

mark-i-m said:

Do we want to have a sync meeting next week (June 16)?

next one would be 23rd according to the calendar or do you want to re-schedule everything?

Hmm... I guess I haven't really thought of us having any rhythm for the last few months. I'm find with June 23, but I'm also personally fine with just doing it next week, too -- whatever works best for most people.
@Santiago Pastorino tomorrow or June 23? Perhaps we can just leave it at June 23... sorry, things have been busy on my end; I've been bad at following up with stuff
June 23rd so we don't even need to change the calendar
no worries at all, I've been busy too and I owe the WG a lot of things :)

Ok, @WG-rustc-dev-guide we will have a meeting at 7:30pm UTC on June 23! If I remember correctly from above, we could discuss:

  • Reorganizing how we do meetings. Perhaps reintroducing the regular sync meeting?
  • Some of the inflight things, I think. In particular, Santiago mentioned some things above
  • Might also be good to give updates on everything and discuss what we want to do next
  • Please feel free to propose something else if you have suggestions
@WG-rustc-dev-guide Just a reminder that this ^^^ is tomorrow
